title: Sample Test 1
subject: Science
description: This is a 20-question mock Science exam based on the Zambian Grade 7 syllabus. It includes multiple-choice and short answer questions with high-quality, syllabus-aligned content.

title: Sample Test 2
subject: Science
description: A second high-quality Science mock exam for Grade 7 learners based on the Zambian syllabus. Includes multiple-choice and short answer questions with detailed explanations.

title: Sample Test 3
subject: Science
description: This is the third mock Grade 7 Science exam featuring 20 high-quality, syllabus-aligned questions with explanations to aid learning.

title: Sample Test 4
subject: Science
description: This is the fourth mock Science exam for Grade 7 Zambian learners. It covers key areas such as energy, the environment, matter, and human health with multiple-choice and short-answer questions.
